item.description: https://sflow.io - sflow.io is a project management tool that is built for software agile development, marketing, sales, and customer support, especially for outsourcing project and cross-organization collaboration project. Free plan up to 3 projects and 5 members.

item.title: Added missing AWS' Free Tier services
item.description:
https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/faqs/#t4g-instances - 750 hours per month of t4g.small until December 31, 2023
https://aws.amazon.com/rds/) - 750 hours per month of db.t2.micro, db.t3.micro, or db.t4g.micro, 20GB of General Purpose (SSD - 750 hours per month of db.t2.micro, db.t3.micro, or db.t4g.micro, 20GB of General Purpose (SSD) storage, 20GB of storage backups
